competitors.name: Walmart
competitors.notes: Most significant e-commerce competitor with Jet.com acquisition

competitors.name: eBay
competitors.notes: Top e-commerce competitor in marketplace space

competitors.name: Alibaba
competitors.notes: Major global player with Taobao and Tmall platforms

competitors.name: Microsoft Azure
competitors.notes: Rebranded from Windows Azure in 2015, major AWS competitor

competitors.name: Google Cloud Platform
competitors.notes: Major cloud contender leveraging data analytics expertise

competitors.name: IBM Cloud
competitors.notes: Over 170 services including IoT, blockchain, containers

context: Intense competition on two fronts. Walmart aggressive online, regional players solidified. Cloud 'big three' (AWS, Azure, GCP) established.
